item.description:
Boston Change for Truth is a meet-up group for those concerned with issues from 9/11 Truth, Ending the Federal Reserve, Vaccine Resistance, Big Pharma - Medical Industrial complex, to Banker Bailouts and the erosion of Civil Liberties and the ongoing global wars of occupation.
Boston Change for Truth supports the activism of We Are Change and the 9/11 Truth movement. While not a member of, or claiming representation of any other organization, we accommodate all political views and welcome civil debate on these topics. Many of our members come from the 9/11 truth movement, We Are Change, Ron Paul, Campaign for Liberty, and Peace and Justice movements. We are both from the left and right (as in small c conservative, not Neo-Con or pro-war), while examining the false left-right paradigm with deep politics and ever present awareness of state sponsored terrorism.
MEMBERSHIP REQUIREMENTS: Please review our membership agreement at: http://www.meetup.com/bostonchangefortruth/about/
item.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth
